An English combat nurse from 1945 is mysteriously swept back in time to 1743." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt3006802/","name":"Outlander","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDVlYTg5NjYtZGRkYS00NjdhLWI4MWUtNmU3MGQ3MWI1MWE5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"An English combat nurse from 1945 is mysteriously swept back in time to 1743.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3006802/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"mcampbelljh1"},"dateCreated":"2014-08-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"An excellent adaptation of the books for all us Outlander fans!","reviewBody":"I've recently been reading (actually listening to the audio-books) the Outlander series of books having completed 5 so far so when I saw the Starz TV series was coming out I just had to watch it. I must say I loved the Outlander books, but I'm not a fanatic when it comes to translating books to the screen they are very different mediums and thus can take on a different look and feel and that's OK with me. In this case, I don't think people who are would be disappointed anyway as the screen writers did an excellent job of translating the 1st part of the book to the screen (I've only seen the 1st episode but I'm already hooked so I'm sure I'll enjoy the rest). 

I loved their choice of actors to take on the roles of Jamie, Claire, Frank and Dugan. Sam Heughan is perfect as Jamie Fraser (just the right bit of good looks and ruggedness one might expect in Jamie). Caitriona Balfe also seemed like a good choice for Claire (beautiful yet strong enough to carry the role). I think Frank/Jack Randall's portrayal by Tobias Menzies will also fit my vision of Frank/Jack and I think he can carry off both roles one as the wicked Jack and the other as the loving yet dull Frank (when compared to Jamie). And the Scottish actors like Graham McTavish (Dougal) will bring old Scotland to life on the screen for me. 

From the 1st episode I think they producers will not be shy to include the more sexual aspects of the Outlander books, as they do have this erotic element that actually makes the love between Claire and Jamie the driving force of their relationship which allows it to span centuries, even when they are no longer together. It's that love/passion for each other that keeps them alive in each other's heart and so far to the directors credit, they have not been shy about adding it. I'm looking forward to the Claire Jamie love scenes hopefully to come... I'm also going to enjoy the Scottish history and scenery, and loved the way they so far have included it in the TV series. It's going to be very interesting to me especially as my ancestors are Scottish.

I know Starz will be increasing its revenues with this series' fans all signing up just to see it. There must be millions of us around the world that love these books and I'm sure like me many of them will order the cable channel just to watch this. I'm very happy to see Starz did such a good job in bringing this to life on the screen. So rarely do we get a good adult drama on TV these days, and this will surely be that. I'm liking many of the original show Starz is offering this season like this and Black Sails, Strikback. Who ever is heading their creative development deserves a lot of credit for their selection of shows to produce. I think Starz is catching up to HBO and Showtime in it's original shows and might even surpass them if it keeps producing shows of this quality plus they have a much better selection of movies that the other channels. As a new Starz member, I'd recommend it to others.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":140339,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.4},"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Drama","Fantasy","Romance"],"datePublished":"2014-08-09","keywords":"scotland,scotsman,year 1743,scottish highlands,sex scene","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1495520/","name":"Caitriona Balfe"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1537825/","name":"Sam Heughan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3795370/","name":"Duncan Lacroix"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0303436/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0410831/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0208971/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0601822/","name":"Ronald D. IMDb data; ttnr: 3006802, Title: Outlander, --- Description: Outlander: Created by Ronald D. Moore. With Caitriona Balfe, Sam Heughan, Duncan Lacroix, Sophie Skelton. An English combat nurse from 1945 is mysteriously swept back in time to 1743." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt3006802/","name":"Outlander","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDVlYTg5NjYtZGRkYS00NjdhLWI4MWUtNmU3MGQ3MWI1MWE5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"An English combat nurse from 1945 is mysteriously swept back in time to 1743.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3006802/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"mcampbelljh1","dateCreated":"2014-08-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"An excellent adaptation of the books for all us Outlander fans!","reviewBody":"I've recently been reading (actually listening to the audio-books) the Outlander series of books having completed 5 so far so when I saw the Starz TV series was coming out I just had to watch it. I must say I loved the Outlander books, but I'm not a fanatic when it comes to translating books to the screen they are very different mediums and thus can take on a different look and feel and that's OK with me. In this case, I don't think people who are would be disappointed anyway as the screen writers did an excellent job of translating the 1st part of the book to the screen (I've only seen the 1st episode but I'm already hooked so I'm sure I'll enjoy the rest). 

I loved their choice of actors to take on the roles of Jamie, Claire, Frank and Dugan. Sam Heughan is perfect as Jamie Fraser (just the right bit of good looks and ruggedness one might expect in Jamie). Caitriona Balfe also seemed like a good choice for Claire (beautiful yet strong enough to carry the role). I think Frank/Jack Randall's portrayal by Tobias Menzies will also fit my vision of Frank/Jack and I think he can carry off both roles one as the wicked Jack and the other as the loving yet dull Frank (when compared to Jamie). And the Scottish actors like Graham McTavish (Dougal) will bring old Scotland to life on the screen for me. 

From the 1st episode I think they producers will not be shy to include the more sexual aspects of the Outlander books, as they do have this erotic element that actually makes the love between Claire and Jamie the driving force of their relationship which allows it to span centuries, even when they are no longer together. It's that love/passion for each other that keeps them alive in each other's heart and so far to the directors credit, they have not been shy about adding it. I'm looking forward to the Claire Jamie love scenes hopefully to come... I'm also going to enjoy the Scottish history and scenery, and loved the way they so far have included it in the TV series. It's going to be very interesting to me especially as my ancestors are Scottish.

I know Starz will be increasing its revenues with this series' fans all signing up just to see it. There must be millions of us around the world that love these books and I'm sure like me many of them will order the cable channel just to watch this. I'm very happy to see Starz did such a good job in bringing this to life on the screen. So rarely do we get a good adult drama on TV these days, and this will surely be that. I'm liking many of the original show Starz is offering this season like this and Black Sails, Strikback. Who ever is heading their creative development deserves a lot of credit for their selection of shows to produce. I think Starz is catching up to HBO and Showtime in it's original shows and might even surpass them if it keeps producing shows of this quality plus they have a much better selection of movies that the other channels. As a new Starz member, I'd recommend it to others.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":140339,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.4,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Drama","Fantasy","Romance"],"datePublished":"2014-08-09","keywords":"scotland,scotsman,year 1743,scottish highlands,sex scene","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1495520/","name":"Caitriona Balfe","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1537825/","name":"Sam Heughan","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3795370/","name":"Duncan Lacroix"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0303436/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0410831/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0208971/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0601822/","name":"Ronald D. Moore"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 6 Teaser","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3784950553","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjVhNmU2YTgtZjg2ZC00MDRmLWI1MTQtZjMwMmY3YmZjN2YxXkEyXkFqcGdeQWxiaWFtb250._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjVhNmU2YTgtZjg2ZC00MDRmLWI1MTQtZjMwMmY3YmZjN2YxXkEyXkFqcGdeQWxiaWFtb250._V1_.jpg","description":"An English combat nurse from 1945 is mysteriously swept back in time to 1743."</script><metacontent=" --- Director: Metin Hüseyin, Stephen Woolfenden, Anna Foerster, Brian Kelly, Mike Barker

programme.title: Onde Reside o Amor
programme.desc: Finn, uma estudante universitária, vai passar o verão à Califórnia, na casa onde vive a sua avó e a sua tia. Tem de acabar a sua tese de doutoramento e refletir sobre uma importante decisão: se vai aceitar o pedido de casamento de Sam, o seu namorado.

programme.title: Hailey Dean Mysteries: Casados para Matar
programme.desc: Quando um negociante de arte é encontrado morto, Hailey Dean junta-se aos amigos – os detetives Danny Morgan, Fincher Garland e Charlene "Monty" Montgomery – para investigar. Hailey começa com uma visita à galeria com Clyde, um amigo da universidade que reencontrou recentemente.

programme.title: Hailey Dean Mysteries: Sede de Matar
programme.desc: Quinze anos depois do assassinato do noivo, Hailey Dean trabalha com o irmão dele, o detetive Danny Morgan, com o detetive Fincher e o colega de faculdade Clyde para finalmente resolver o caso.

programme.title: Candice Renoir
Candice Renoir
programme.sub-title: Tout Vient À Point À Qui Sait Attendre
programme.desc:
Candice Renoir: Created by Robin Barataud, Brigitte Peskine, Solen Roy-Pagenault. With Cécile Bois, Raphaël Lenglet, Clara Antoons, Ali Marhyar. The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine is between solving crimes, taking out fights with her much younger female police superior officer, getting her kids to school - in addition - handling their problems too and keeping her team in line. It's a very funny and witty series with a lot of french charm and intelligent story writing. Not another dull crime series all over again. It's like a fresh french breeze on the TV screen. Candice is like a female Columbo version in high heels, handbag pink scarf and a 9mm in her holster." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt2819924/","name":"Candice Renoir","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM3YzUxM2UtZjIyMC00Zjg5LTk0NTMtNGQ3ZWQ0ODhlMTJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjc0NTExNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine ","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2819924/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Doctor_Dexter"},"dateCreated":"2016-06-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"The female sitcom-detective cliché","reviewBody":"Over the last decades, in Europe, we've been swamped with the older female detective character with a family in tow. Some have a weak excuse for a husband to emphasise their strength, many others are independent single mothers who struggle with a demanding job and raising their kids. To be honest, I'm not a fan of the genre. Nothing against strong and independent women, au contraire. I just prefer decent detective work above being sucked into the personal life of a fictional character. If I wanted to see family drama I'd go watch a sitcom. It's beyond me why the detective genre has to be muddled with sitcom-esque fluff like this. (I wouldn't buy it, but it's programmed on TV *instead* of a proper detective). I can accept a modest degree of family life. After all, Beck and Wallander have families too. However, they are primarily detectives, and every episode is about solving the case. 

"Candice Renoir" is more sitcom than detectives. And it's just as tacky and kitschy as the name already suggests. A fifty-something big mama, who seems to think she's Brigitte Bardot in the seventies, miraculously becomes the team leader of a small town detective team. She blunders through everything, but 'magically' finds clues in fashion magazines and the likes. She's supposed to portray the strong and independent older woman who can do it all, kids and playing the boss- detective, but it's way to contrived to be the least bit believable. Her character, the rainbow team, the younger cutesy neighbour - who has stamped "love interest" in all caps across his handsome forehead - it's all a stylised light version of a concept we've seen many, many times before. And now it's here again, only worse. Yay. 

To be fair, the acting of the team and other characters varies from passable to decent, but the lead actress is really milking the diva character, and as such, overacting horribly in just about every scene.

It might just about do as daytime TV, on a rainy afternoon, but that's probably me being generous.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":1}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1103,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5},"contentRating":"TV-G","genre":["Comedy","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2013-04-19","keywords":"france,female police officer,police","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0092291/","name":"Cécile Bois"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0501845/","name":"Raphaël Lenglet"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6511436/","name":"Clara Antoons"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0011107/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0053077/","name":"Robin Barataud"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0043904/","name":"Brigitte Peskine"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2784794/","name":"Solen Roy-Pagenault"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Promo Bande-annonce [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2892283161","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2FhNWFlYmItYmE5My00ZmM0LThlZDctZGE5YjhiMThkZDQ1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2FhNWFlYmItYmE5My00ZmM0LThlZDctZGE5YjhiMThkZDQ1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""}}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 2819924, Title: Candice Renoir, --- Description: Candice Renoir: Created by Robin Barataud, Brigitte Peskine, Solen Roy-Pagenault. With Cécile Bois, Raphaël Lenglet, Clara Antoons, Ali Marhyar. The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine is between solving crimes, taking out fights with her much younger female police superior officer, getting her kids to school - in addition - handling their problems too and keeping her team in line. It's a very funny and witty series with a lot of french charm and intelligent story writing. Not another dull crime series all over again. It's like a fresh french breeze on the TV screen. Candice is like a female Columbo version in high heels, handbag pink scarf and a 9mm in her holster." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt2819924/","name":"Candice Renoir","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM3YzUxM2UtZjIyMC00Zjg5LTk0NTMtNGQ3ZWQ0ODhlMTJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjc0NTExNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine ","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2819924/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Doctor_Dexter","dateCreated":"2016-06-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"The female sitcom-detective cliché","reviewBody":"Over the last decades, in Europe, we've been swamped with the older female detective character with a family in tow. Some have a weak excuse for a husband to emphasise their strength, many others are independent single mothers who struggle with a demanding job and raising their kids. To be honest, I'm not a fan of the genre. Nothing against strong and independent women, au contraire. I just prefer decent detective work above being sucked into the personal life of a fictional character. If I wanted to see family drama I'd go watch a sitcom. It's beyond me why the detective genre has to be muddled with sitcom-esque fluff like this. (I wouldn't buy it, but it's programmed on TV *instead* of a proper detective). I can accept a modest degree of family life. After all, Beck and Wallander have families too. However, they are primarily detectives, and every episode is about solving the case. 

"Candice Renoir" is more sitcom than detectives. And it's just as tacky and kitschy as the name already suggests. A fifty-something big mama, who seems to think she's Brigitte Bardot in the seventies, miraculously becomes the team leader of a small town detective team. She blunders through everything, but 'magically' finds clues in fashion magazines and the likes. She's supposed to portray the strong and independent older woman who can do it all, kids and playing the boss- detective, but it's way to contrived to be the least bit believable. Her character, the rainbow team, the younger cutesy neighbour - who has stamped "love interest" in all caps across his handsome forehead - it's all a stylised light version of a concept we've seen many, many times before. And now it's here again, only worse. Yay. 

To be fair, the acting of the team and other characters varies from passable to decent, but the lead actress is really milking the diva character, and as such, overacting horribly in just about every scene.

It might just about do as daytime TV, on a rainy afternoon, but that's probably me being generous.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":1,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1103,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5,"contentRating":"TV-G","genre":["Comedy","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2013-04-19","keywords":"france,female police officer,police","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0092291/","name":"Cécile Bois","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0501845/","name":"Raphaël Lenglet","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6511436/","name":"Clara Antoons"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0011107/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0053077/","name":"Robin Barataud","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0043904/","name":"Brigitte Peskine","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2784794/","name":"Solen Roy-Pagenault"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Promo Bande-annonce [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2892283161","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2FhNWFlYmItYmE5My00ZmM0LThlZDctZGE5YjhiMThkZDQ1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2FhNWFlYmItYmE5My00ZmM0LThlZDctZGE5YjhiMThkZDQ1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""</script><metacontent=" --- Director: Pascal Lahmani, Nicolas Picard-Dreyfuss, Stéphane Malhuret, Olivier Barma, Raphaël Lenglet

programme.title: Argumento de Amor
programme.desc: Keith Michaels já foi um argumentista de sucesso, premiado pela Academia, mas o seu momento de glória passou e enfrenta agora graves problemas financeiros. Como tal, aceita dar aulas a universitários, embora despreze a profissão de professor.

programme.title: Peppermint
programme.desc: História de vingança centrada numa jovem mãe que não tem nada a perder, após o marido e a filha terem sido assassinados. Desta forma, Riley North decide tirar a vida aos rivais que lhe roubaram a família e vingar-se do sistema judicial que os deixou em liberdade.

programme.title: Bordertown - Cidade Sob Ameaça
programme.desc: Uma jornalista do "Chicago Sentinel", filha de imigrantes mexicanos, investiga uma série de crimes de mulheres perto de fábricas americanas na fronteira de Juarez e El Paso.

programme.title: Mandy
programme.desc: Red e Mandy levam uma vida tranquila numa cabana isolada junto a um lago do Colorado. Um dia, a sua casa é invadida por membros de uma seita religiosa que matam Mandy e deixam Red à beira da morte. Traumatizado, apenas uma coisa o mantém preso à vida: um intenso desejo de punir os responsáveis.

programme.title: Rogue Warfare: Fim de Uma Nação
programme.desc: Uma terrível organização terrorista coordena um ataque mortífero que vai devastar o mundo nas próximas 36 horas. Só uma equipa de elite que une os melhores militares de várias nações pode evitar o desastre.

programme.title: Cidade Sob Ameaça
programme.desc: Após ter provocado, acidentalmente, um grave acidente ao seu parceiro, o agente Jim Dillon jura nunca mais pegar numa arma, até ao dia em que um grupo de violentos motards invade a cidade onde ele é marshall e não lhe resta outra opção senão confrontar os fantasmas do seu passado para a defender.

programme.title: O Teu Melhor Amigo
programme.desc: Depois de uma experiência caseira terminar em desastre, um génio de 12 anos descobre ter desenvolvido uma inesperada ligação telepática com o seu cão. A dupla improvável une então esforços para ultrapassar os desafios do dia a dia...

programme.title: Segundo Ato
programme.desc: Maya luta com as frustrações inerentes aos seus sonhos não realizados. Até ao dia em que surge a oportunidade de provar a Madison Avenue que a sabedoria 'das ruas' é tão válida como a de um curso superior e que nunca é tarde para um Segundo Ato...

programme.title: Girls Night
programme.desc: Quatro melhores amigas do tempo da escola reúnem-se, 10 anos mais tarde, para uma despedida de solteira selvagem em Miami. Pippa, uma amiga recente da noiva, também se junta ao grupo. A festa louca sofre uma reviravolta inesperada quando as cinco amigas matam acidentalmente um stripper.

programme.title: Jogo de Espiões
programme.desc: Um operativo da CIA, Nathan Muir, está prestes a reformar-se quando descobre que o seu protegido, Tom Bishop, foi preso na China por espionagem. Nada estranho aos mecanismos de funcionamento da CIA, Muir enceta todos os esforços para libertar Bishop.

programme.title: Os Agentes do Destino
programme.desc: David Norris é um jovem político com uma carreira promissora, até que se apaixona por Elise, uma bailarina. Agora, homens com estranhos poderes de interferir no futuro aparecem do nada e começam a pressioná-lo para que ele não dê continuidade a este romance.

programme.title: O Turista
programme.desc: Frank, um pacato norte-americano de férias em Veneza, conhece Elise, uma mulher que esconde um misterioso segredo. A sua relação rapidamente se transforma numa complicada teia de perigos e enganos, quando se veem perseguidos pela Interpol, pela polícia italiana e por assassinos russos.

programme.title: Dupla Sedução
programme.desc: Claire é ex-agente da CIA. Ray é ex-agente da MI6. Ambos trocaram a espionagem governamental pelo lucrativo mundo dos negócios, onde reina uma terrível "Guerra Fria" entre duas multinacionais rivais. Agora, a missão é obter a fórmula de um produto que trará fortuna à empresa que o patentear.

programme.title: Downton Abbey
programme.desc: Os Crawleys e os funcionários preparam-se para o momento mais alto das suas vidas: uma visita do rei e da rainha de Inglaterra. Uma adaptação para cinema da série fenómeno "Downton Abbey".

programme.title: Million Dollar Baby - Sonhos Vencidos
programme.desc: Frankie Dunn foi agente e treinador dos melhores pugilistas, numa vida passada nos ringues de boxe. Na sequência do doloroso afastamento da sua filha, Frankie revela uma já longa dificuldade na aproximação aos outros. Já Maggie sabe bem o que quer e tem a determinação necessária para o alcançar.

programme.title: O Bairro da Máfia
programme.desc: Após um período no exército, onde participou na Operação Tempestade no Deserto, Tommy, o filho de um mafioso de Filadélfia, é forçado por um agente do FBI a infiltrar-se no negócio da família para provar que a máfia siciliana está a tentar dominar o tráfico de heroína nos EUA.

programme.title: Plano B
programme.desc: Quando o agente dos serviços secretos Vic Davis vai buscar o filho à universidade, percebe que há um rapto prestes a acontecer. A vítima é uma colega do rapaz, filha de um juiz do Supremo Tribunal, e os malfeitores não vão parar até a terem para usá-la como vantagem negocial.

programme.title: Presa Implacável
programme.desc: O capitão Matt Hendricks e Linda Christian encontram-se presos num submarino com terroristas russos que ameaçam lançar um vírus letal no território americano.

programme.title: Nós Que Ficámos
programme.desc: A vida pacata de Cami e da sua filha adolescente é virada do avesso com o falecimento repentino do pai da rapariga, cuja nova mulher e filha pequena ficam de repente sem lar nem rendimentos. Cami acolhe-as em sua casa, mas não vai ser fácil juntar aquelas quatro figuras debaixo do mesmo teto.

programme.title: Filadélfia
programme.desc: Aparentemente com uma carreira de sucesso pela frente, Andrew Beckett é despedido da firma de advogados onde trabalha quando descobrem que está infetado com o vírus da SIDA. O advogado contrata então os serviços de Joe Miller, acusando a firma de o ter despedido apenas por discriminação.

programme.title: Assalto de Risco
programme.desc: Crunch Calhoun, um motoqueiro ladrão de arte, é preso depois de ser traído por Nick, seu irmão e parceiro no crime. Quando deixa a cadeia, Crunch concorda em reunir o seu velho gangue para levarem a cabo um último e audacioso golpe: roubar os livros mais valiosos do mundo.

programme.title: A Arte da Guerra: Traição
programme.desc: Reformado ao fim de uma carreira irrepreensível, o agente Neil Shaw vê-se subitamente envolvido num estranho e secreto plano para assassinar vários senadores.

programme.title: Dupla Sedução
programme.desc: Claire é ex-agente da CIA. Ray é ex-agente da MI6. Ambos trocaram a espionagem governamental pelo lucrativo mundo dos negócios, onde reina uma terrível "Guerra Fria" entre duas multinacionais rivais. Agora, a missão é obter a fórmula de um produto que trará fortuna à empresa que o patentear.

programme.title: Evereste
programme.desc: Inspirado na história verídica de uma expedição ao cume do Evereste, que terminou em tragédia. Os alpinistas foram apanhados de surpresa por uma violenta tempestade de neve.

programme.title: Downton Abbey
programme.desc: Os Crawleys e os funcionários preparam-se para o momento mais alto das suas vidas: uma visita do rei e da rainha de Inglaterra. Uma adaptação para cinema da série fenómeno "Downton Abbey".

programme.title: Sete Anos no Tibete
programme.desc: Heinrich Harrer, um alpinista austríaco, tenta, em 1939, subir os Himalaias e trava conhecimento com o jovem Dalai Lama. Ele e o seu companheiro Peter são os únicos dois estrangeiros a pisar a cidade sagrada de Lhasa. Esta viagem leva-os a testemunhar um momento marcante da história do Tibete.

programme.title: Drácula de Bram Stoker
programme.desc: Neste remake da clássica história, o príncipe da Transilvânia, no século XIX, viaja até Londres em busca de amor humano. Depois de viver sozinho durante anos, o desejo de Drácula por algo humano transforma-se no seu maior propósito. Em Londres, este encontra Mina, uma sósia da sua falecida mulher.

programme.title: O Atirador
programme.desc: Um atirador de grande perícia, retirado depois de ter sido alvo de traição, vive agora em exílio. No entanto, volta ao ativo depois de tomar conhecimento de um plano para matar o Presidente dos EUA. Novamente traído e acusado do sucedido, Bob enceta uma fuga e parte em busca do verdadeiro assassino.

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation
CSI: Crime Sob Investigação

programme.title: O Dia Depois de Amanhã
programme.desc: Quando o aquecimento global está prestes a levar-nos para uma nova Idade do Gelo, uma onda gigante engole Nova Iorque e todo o hemisfério norte começa a ficar gelado. O climatologista Jack Hall, o seu filho Sam e um pequeno grupo de sobreviventes têm de sair da cada vez mais devastadora tempestade.

programme.title: Viagem ao Centro da Terra 2: A Ilha Misteriosa
programme.desc: Sean Anderson recebe um sinal de socorro codificado vindo de uma misteriosa ilha. Incapaz de impedir Sean de embarcar nesta aventura, o seu padrasto Hank junta-se à viagem. Com um piloto e a filha, partem em busca da ilha para resgatarem um habitante solitário. Mas será que vão conseguir escapar?

programme.title: San Andreas
programme.desc: Depois de um sismo de magnitude 9 afetar a Califórnia, um piloto, especializado em resgate e salvamento, e a ex-mulher tentam salvar a sua única filha. No entanto, isto é apenas o início, pois, quando eles pensam que o pior já passou, este está, na verdade, a começar.

programme.title: Liga de Cavalheiros Extraordinários
programme.desc: Allan Quatermain lidera uma legião de super-heróis capazes de proezas incríveis. A Liga dos Cavalheiros Extraordinários é composta pelo capitão Nemo, Mina Harker, Rodney Skinner, Tom Sawyer, Dorian Gray e Henry Jekyll. Incumbida de uma nova missão, a equipa tem apenas nove horas para salvar o mundo.

programme.title: Mad Max: Estrada da Fúria
programme.desc: Perseguido pelo seu passado turbulento, Mad Max acredita que a melhor forma de sobreviver é não depender de ninguém. Ainda assim, junta-se a um grupo de rebeldes que atravessa Wasteland numa máquina de guerra conduzida por Furiosa, a imperatriz de elite.

programme.title: Engenhos Mortíferos
programme.desc: Centenas de anos após a civilização ter sido destruída por um cataclismo, uma jovem misteriosa, Hester Shaw, surge como a única pessoa capaz de parar Londres. A capital inglesa é agora uma cidade gigante e predadora sob rodas, que poderá devorar tudo no seu caminho.

programme.title: Riddick - A Ascensão
programme.desc: Traído pela sua própria raça e deixado para morrer num planeta isolado, Riddick luta para sobreviver num ambiente hostil repleto de predadores alienígenas e caçadores de toda a galáxia.

programme.title: Colateral
programme.desc: Max tem uma longa experiência como taxista e está curado de sustos. Até que, numa noite, tem como passageiro um assassino com uma missão em mãos. Vincent faz do taxista refém, à medida que se move pela noite de Los Angeles com cinco paragens em vista... e cinco pessoas para matar.

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
Investigação Criminal: New Orleans
programme.desc:
NCIS: New Orleans: Created by Gary Glasberg. With Scott Bakula, Rob Kerkovich, CCH Pounder, Daryl Mitchell. Follows an NCIS team that investigates criminal cases involving military personnel in The Big Easy, a city known for its music, entertainment, and decadence." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt3560084/","name":"NCIS: New Orleans","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjM3OTk1NTQyNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjU4NDQwMDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Follows an NCIS team that investigates criminal cases involving military personnel in The Big Easy, a city known for its music, entertainment, and decadence.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3560084/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"elainecalloway216"},"dateCreated":"2014-04-03","inLanguage":"English","name":"Might be a good spin off","reviewBody":"I grew up in New Orleans and I'm an avid NCIS fan, so I was interested to see how they would handle the Crescent City episodes. Overall, I think it did really well. 8 points out of 10.

A few things: 1. In episode 1, there were a few mistakes that those people who are locals could easily notice. A little bit more research would've been better, but the plot/characters/etc. was good.

2. Bakula's ongoing "my brother, my brother" is too much. People in NOLA don't do that, if anything they say "cher" as an affectionate term for friend, so it seemed overdone on the show.

3. A little bit hard to believe in part 2, that a woman would leave a bar to walk in a dark alley alone with someone she had just met. No local would ever do that. 

4. I liked part 2 much more than part 1, because they focused more on places the locals go to and not just the "tourist top 10 spots" like in episode 1. I also loved how they talked about the city and it gets into your DNA. Great and well scripted.

5. IMDb data; ttnr: 3560084, Title: NCIS: New Orleans, --- Description: NCIS: New Orleans: Created by Gary Glasberg. With Scott Bakula, Rob Kerkovich, CCH Pounder, Daryl Mitchell. Follows an NCIS team that investigates criminal cases involving military personnel in The Big Easy, a city known for its music, entertainment, and decadence." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt3560084/","name":"NCIS: New Orleans","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjM3OTk1NTQyNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjU4NDQwMDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Follows an NCIS team that investigates criminal cases involving military personnel in The Big Easy, a city known for its music, entertainment, and decadence.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3560084/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"elainecalloway216","dateCreated":"2014-04-03","inLanguage":"English","name":"Might be a good spin off","reviewBody":"I grew up in New Orleans and I'm an avid NCIS fan, so I was interested to see how they would handle the Crescent City episodes. Overall, I think it did really well. 8 points out of 10.

A few things: 1. In episode 1, there were a few mistakes that those people who are locals could easily notice. A little bit more research would've been better, but the plot/characters/etc. was good.

2. Bakula's ongoing "my brother, my brother" is too much. People in NOLA don't do that, if anything they say "cher" as an affectionate term for friend, so it seemed overdone on the show.

3. A little bit hard to believe in part 2, that a woman would leave a bar to walk in a dark alley alone with someone she had just met. No local would ever do that. 

4. I liked part 2 much more than part 1, because they focused more on places the locals go to and not just the "tourist top 10 spots" like in episode 1. I also loved how they talked about the city and it gets into your DNA. Great and well scripted.

5. Love the actors and think it could be a great series going forward :)","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":16860,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2014-09-23","keywords":"usa,united states,investigation,naval officer,u.s. navy","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000836/","name":"Scott Bakula","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1827376/","name":"Rob Kerkovich","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001634/","name":"CCH Pounder"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0373192/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0113138/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0274041/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0321782/","name":"Gary Glasberg"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"NCIS: New Orleans: The Fourth Season","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1485290009","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzNkZDYwZjEtMWNlZi00Zjg5LWJhYjktYmY0NzY0ODM2NjM1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRoaXJkLXBhcnR5LXZpZGVvLXVwZGF0ZXI@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzNkZDYwZjEtMWNlZi00Zjg5LWJhYjktYmY0NzY0ODM2NjM1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRoaXJkLXBhcnR5LXZpZGVvLXVwZGF0ZXI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Promo"</script><metacontent=" --- Director: James Hayman, James Whitmore Jr., Michael Zinberg, Tony Wharmby, Mary Lou Belli

A few things: 1. In episode 1, there were a few mistakes that those people who are locals could easily notice. A little bit more research would've been better, but the plot/characters/etc. was good.

2. Bakula's ongoing "my brother, my brother" is too much. People in NOLA don't do that, if anything they say "cher" as an affectionate term for friend, so it seemed overdone on the show.

3. A little bit hard to believe in part 2, that a woman would leave a bar to walk in a dark alley alone with someone she had just met. No local would ever do that. 

4. I liked part 2 much more than part 1, because they focused more on places the locals go to and not just the "tourist top 10 spots" like in episode 1. I also loved how they talked about the city and it gets into your DNA. Great and well scripted.

programme.desc: CSI: Miami: Created by Ann Donahue, Carol Mendelsohn, Anthony E. Zuiker. With David Caruso, Emily Procter, Adam Rodriguez, Rex Linn. The cases of the Miami-Dade, Florida police department's Crime Scene Investigations unit." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0313043/","name":"CSI: Miami","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTU3ZTI5ZGEtYjhiMy00ODU4LTgyM2UtNDhlYjBhMjc4MjIwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTYzMDM0NTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"The cases of the Miami-Dade, Florida police department's Crime Scene Investigations unit.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0313043/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"shaypack"},"dateCreated":"2005-11-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"Change the name to CSI: Vogue","reviewBody":"One person ruins this show: David Caruso. All he does is pose. They should make it into a drinking game. Every time he strikes a pose, take a shot. Of course, people have died from alcohol poisoning. This would only add to the statistics. All the other characters have depth. He just gets this look on his face and 'strikes a pose'. Watch him turn sideways and look over his shoulder. Wow!! OOOhhh, he figured out something. Time for him to take off his sunglasses. I challenge any of you to find an episode where he isn't positioned sideways looking over his shoulder and where he takes off his sunglasses. Quit posing and pretend like you know how to act!!!!\n\nAnd, how come he has to figure everything out? The other shows let the other characters show some brains. How 'bout letting the other CSI Vogue characters have a little spotlight?"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":55488,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2002-09-23","keywords":"place name in title,city name in title,city in title,united states of america,usa","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000325/","name":"David Caruso"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0698346/","name":"Emily Procter"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0735226/","name":"Adam Rodriguez"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0054762/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0183875/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0048735/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0231929/","name":"Ann Donahue"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0578856/","name":"Carol Mendelsohn"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0958499/","name":"Anthony E. programme.title: CSI: Miami
CSI: Miami
programme.desc: CSI: Miami: Created by Ann Donahue, Carol Mendelsohn, Anthony E. Zuiker. With David Caruso, Emily Procter, Adam Rodriguez, Rex Linn. The cases of the Miami-Dade, Florida police department's Crime Scene Investigations unit." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0313043/","name":"CSI: Miami","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTU3ZTI5ZGEtYjhiMy00ODU4LTgyM2UtNDhlYjBhMjc4MjIwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTYzMDM0NTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"The cases of the Miami-Dade, Florida police department's Crime Scene Investigations unit.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0313043/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"shaypack"},"dateCreated":"2005-11-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"Change the name to CSI: Vogue","reviewBody":"One person ruins this show: David Caruso. All he does is pose. They should make it into a drinking game. Every time he strikes a pose, take a shot. Of course, people have died from alcohol poisoning. This would only add to the statistics. All the other characters have depth. He just gets this look on his face and 'strikes a pose'. Watch him turn sideways and look over his shoulder. Wow!! OOOhhh, he figured out something. Time for him to take off his sunglasses. I challenge any of you to find an episode where he isn't positioned sideways looking over his shoulder and where he takes off his sunglasses. Quit posing and pretend like you know how to act!!!!\n\nAnd, how come he has to figure everything out? The other shows let the other characters show some brains. How 'bout letting the other CSI Vogue characters have a little spotlight?"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":55488,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2002-09-23","keywords":"place name in title,city name in title,city in title,united states of america,usa","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000325/","name":"David Caruso"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0698346/","name":"Emily Procter"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0735226/","name":"Adam Rodriguez"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0054762/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0183875/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0048735/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0231929/","name":"Ann Donahue"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0578856/","name":"Carol Mendelsohn"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0958499/","name":"Anthony E. Zuiker"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"CSI: Miami: Complete Season 8","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi320379929","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWU1NzhhNjItMzQ5ZC00YmFmLWEwMmYtMWVlMjFkNjdkZGNiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWU1NzhhNjItMzQ5ZC00YmFmLWEwMmYtMWVlMjFkNjdkZGNiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for CSI: Miami - Complete Season 08"}}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Hansel & Gretel: Caçadores de Bruxas
programme.desc: Depois de terem ganho o gosto à caça às bruxas, ainda em crianças, Hansel e Gretel tornam-se grandes vigilantes, determinados a retaliar. Mas, sem saberem, os dois irmãos passam a ser o alvo e terão de enfrentar um mal ainda maior: o passado.

programme.title: Amigos Para o Que Der e Vier
programme.desc: Quando o mulherengo Steve fica a saber que o seu melhor amigo Ben, uma pessoa um pouco à margem, acabou de perder o pai, os dois regressam à casa de Ben. Aí descobrem que este herdou a fortuna da família, bem como uma batalha contra a irmã e a bela viúva de 25 anos.

programme.title: Faz-te Homem
programme.desc: Quando James King é condenado por fraude e sentenciado a prisão em San Quentin, o juiz dá-lhe 30 dias para organizar a vida antes de cumprir pena. Desesperado, recorre a Darnell Lewis, um suposto vilão, para ajudá-lo a preparar-se para a vida na cadeia.

programme.title: Até que o Fim do Mundo nos Separe
programme.desc: Um asteroide com 100 quilómetros de largura está em rota de colisão com a Terra e o mundo vai acabar dentro de três semanas. Um dia Penny vai entregar a Dodge uma carta que se extraviara e o futuro dos dois, ainda que curto, está prestes a mudar.

programme.title: Má Vizinhança 2
programme.desc: Mac e Kelly Radner esperam o segundo filho e estão prontos para a derradeira mudança: os subúrbios. Mas quando descobrem que os novos vizinhos são uma irmandade ainda mais descontrolada do que a de Teddy, terão de unir forças com o ex-inimigo.

programme.desc: Philippe decide livrar-se da irmã. Sabedor das alergias do cunhado, Philippe mata-o colocando amendoim no almoço, o que provoca um choque anafilático letal. programme.title: Crimes Perfeitos: Não Há Fumo Sem Fogo
programme.desc: Quando Jean-Baptiste volta, Clémence planeia o homicídio perfeito para o herdeiro inútil. Fazendo uso dos sistemas de segurança comercializados pela empresa da família, engendra um acidente de viação rebuscado. No entanto, não contou com a astúcia do capitão Delaunay e da tenente Mizon...

programme.title: Enquanto Estiveres Aí...
programme.desc: Elizabeth tem um trágico acidente de carro e fica em coma. David, um jovem viúvo, arrenda o apartamento dela. Quando se muda, o espírito de Elizabeth começa a assombrá-lo, não tendo memória do acidente ou de quem é. Para tentar resolver o conflito, ele compromete-se a descobrir quem ela realmente é.

programme.title: Welcome To Christmas
programme.desc: O xerife Gage McBride e os residentes da localidade de Christmas, no Colorado, fazem tudo para convencer Madison Lane a construir o resort da empresa nas redondezas. Madison, que é viciada em trabalho, acaba por se apaixonar pela cidade pitoresca, pelo xerife viúvo e bem-parecido e pela sua família.

programme.title: A Christmas Duet
programme.desc: Durante a confusão que é planear um festival de Natal e concorrer ao prémio de melhor alojamento de inverno, a dona de uma estalagem redescobre o amor pela música e, pelo caminho, o amor pelo seu antigo parceiro musical.

programme.title: Chicago Med
Chicago Med
programme.desc: Chicago Med: Created by Michael Brandt, Derek Haas, Matt Olmstead, Dick Wolf. With Nick Gehlfuss, Marlyne Barrett, S. Epatha Merkerson, Oliver Platt. The city's most highly skilled medical team saves lives, while navigating their unique interpersonal relationships." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt4655480/","name":"Chicago Med","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDUzNTBiZTUtZjBkOC00MzAyLTgxYTUtMjVkZDQ3MGUzNDE1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyODUxOTU0OTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"The city's most highly skilled medical team saves lives, while navigating their unique interpersonal relationships.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt4655480/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"mel2718"},"dateCreated":"2020-04-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"An hour of entertaining tv","reviewBody":"I read other reviews slamming the show and everyone has a right to their opinion. My thought is, if you don't like it, don't watch it. I personally enjoy it, along with the Chicago franchise (Fire&PD). The crossover events are especially fun to watch. Is the use of accurate information on medication always correct? I can't say as I am not a doctor. I watch it because I like the characters and the stories. I'm sure there could be improvements, as with most tv. But this is not a documentary, its meant for entertainment. At least the characters have back stories. Lives outside the hospital. Dick Wolf has smartly created a network of series that all intermingle and its interesting to see how the New York shows come into play with the Chicago shows. So, just try it. And I don't mean to offend but to say it's like a soap opera is kinda funny to me because what is Grey's if not a soap? Most medical dramas have an element of such as well as miraculous cures at the end of the hour.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":21196,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2015-11-17","keywords":"shared universe,doctor,emergency room,hospital,medical profession","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3674742/","name":"Nick Gehlfuss"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0012679/","name":"Marlyne Barrett"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0580924/","name":"S. The city's most highly skilled medical team saves lives, while navigating their unique interpersonal relationships." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt4655480/","name":"Chicago Med","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDUzNTBiZTUtZjBkOC00MzAyLTgxYTUtMjVkZDQ3MGUzNDE1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyODUxOTU0OTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"The city's most highly skilled medical team saves lives, while navigating their unique interpersonal relationships.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt4655480/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"mel2718"},"dateCreated":"2020-04-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"An hour of entertaining tv","reviewBody":"I read other reviews slamming the show and everyone has a right to their opinion. My thought is, if you don't like it, don't watch it. I personally enjoy it, along with the Chicago franchise (Fire&PD). The crossover events are especially fun to watch. Is the use of accurate information on medication always correct? I can't say as I am not a doctor. I watch it because I like the characters and the stories. I'm sure there could be improvements, as with most tv. But this is not a documentary, its meant for entertainment. At least the characters have back stories. Lives outside the hospital. Dick Wolf has smartly created a network of series that all intermingle and its interesting to see how the New York shows come into play with the Chicago shows. So, just try it. And I don't mean to offend but to say it's like a soap opera is kinda funny to me because what is Grey's if not a soap? programme.title: Our Christmas Love Song
programme.desc: Quando Melody Jones, uma estrela da música country, é acusada de plagiar o seu single natalício, decide voltar para casa para passar o Natal com a família, com quem não tem muito contacto. Também reencontra uma paixão antiga e aprende o que é realmente importante na vida.

programme.title: The Christmas Club
programme.desc: Olivia Bennett e Edward Taylor, dois estranhos com uma vida ocupada, conhecem-se quando ajudam uma senhora de idade a encontrar as suas poupanças de Natal. Graças ao destino e à magia do Natal, encontram também algo que faltava aos dois: o amor verdadeiro.

programme.title: Two Turtle Doves
programme.desc: Enquanto procurava uma relíquia de família numa pequena cidade natalícia, a Dra. Sharon Harper descobre inesperadamente uma menina adorável e o seu pai desalentado com a vida. Chega então à conclusão de que os milagres de Natal acontecem de verdade.

programme.title: Enquanto Estiveres Aí...
programme.desc: Elizabeth tem um trágico acidente de carro e fica em coma. David, um jovem viúvo, arrenda o apartamento dela. Quando se muda, o espírito de Elizabeth começa a assombrá-lo, não tendo memória do acidente ou de quem é. Para tentar resolver o conflito, ele compromete-se a descobrir quem ela realmente é.

programme.title: Um Segredo do Passado
programme.desc: Adele, uma mãe solteira e deprimida, e o seu filho Henry oferecem abrigo a um homem ferido que, mais tarde, lhes revela ser um condenado em fuga. À medida que a polícia o procura, mãe e filho vão sabendo, gradualmente, a sua história verdadeira e as suas opções tornam-se cada vez mais limitadas.

programme.title: Guernsey - A Sociedade Literária da Tarte de Casca de Batata
programme.desc: Juliet Ashton é uma jovem escritora com falta de inspiração, que logo após a Segunda Guerra Mundial recebe uma carta de um membro da misteriosa Sociedade Literária de Guernsey. Curiosa por saber mais, Juliet decide encontrar-se com os excêntricos membros...

programme.title: As Cinquenta Sombras Livre
programme.desc: Acreditando que deixaram para trás as obscuridades do passado, os recém-casados Christian e Anastacia aproveitam ao máximo o amor e uma vida de luxo. Mas novas ameaças colocam em perigo o seu final feliz.

programme.title: Secrets In The Snow
programme.desc: Quando Christina vai conhecer a família do seu novo namorado, vê-se no meio de um drama familiar que envolve a morte de um dos membros da família.

programme.title: Love at Look Lodge
programme.desc: Lily quer ser diretora de atividades na estalagem onde trabalha e fica muito entusiasmada quando lhe é dada essa oportunidade ao ajudar Noah e a família, que estão no local por ocasião do casamento da irmã dele.

programme.title: The Art of Us
programme.desc: Há faíscas à solta quando um homem que passeia cães, e que tem um talento escondido, se torna o alvo da atenção de uma professora que procura causa uma boa impressão com uma exposição de arte.

programme.title: Poisonous Protégé
programme.desc: A tentativa de uma mulher para reestabelecer contacto com a família acaba em homicídio e desconfiança.

programme.title: June In January
programme.desc: Uma noiva sonhou com o dia do seu casamento a vida inteira, planeando cada detalhe. Tudo parece ir por água abaixo quando a futura sogra quase estraga o dia e o noivo tem uma transferência de emprego, que leva a que o casamento ao ar livre de junho tenha de ser alterado para janeiro.

programme.title: Chicago Med
Chicago Med
programme.desc: Chicago Med: Created by Michael Brandt, Derek Haas, Matt Olmstead, Dick Wolf. With Nick Gehlfuss, Marlyne Barrett, S. Epatha Merkerson, Oliver Platt. The city's most highly skilled medical team saves lives, while navigating their unique interpersonal relationships." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt4655480/","name":"Chicago Med","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDUzNTBiZTUtZjBkOC00MzAyLTgxYTUtMjVkZDQ3MGUzNDE1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyODUxOTU0OTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"The city's most highly skilled medical team saves lives, while navigating their unique interpersonal relationships.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt4655480/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"mel2718"},"dateCreated":"2020-04-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"An hour of entertaining tv","reviewBody":"I read other reviews slamming the show and everyone has a right to their opinion. My thought is, if you don't like it, don't watch it. I personally enjoy it, along with the Chicago franchise (Fire&PD). The crossover events are especially fun to watch. Is the use of accurate information on medication always correct? I can't say as I am not a doctor. I watch it because I like the characters and the stories. I'm sure there could be improvements, as with most tv. But this is not a documentary, its meant for entertainment. At least the characters have back stories. Lives outside the hospital. Dick Wolf has smartly created a network of series that all intermingle and its interesting to see how the New York shows come into play with the Chicago shows. So, just try it. And I don't mean to offend but to say it's like a soap opera is kinda funny to me because what is Grey's if not a soap? Most medical dramas have an element of such as well as miraculous cures at the end of the hour.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":21196,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2015-11-17","keywords":"shared universe,doctor,emergency room,hospital,medical profession","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3674742/","name":"Nick Gehlfuss"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0012679/","name":"Marlyne Barrett"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0580924/","name":"S.
